product_overview: Beauty OS is an all-in-one SaaS platform designed to modernize the management of beauty salons and barbershops. It offers a premium, highly visual experience with robust features covering appointment scheduling, financial management, client CRM, and operational insights. The product features distinct visual themes tailored for salons and barbershops, enhancing brand identity and user engagement.
core_goals: Provide a B2B SaaS solution for multiple beauty and barber establishments with multi-tenant architecture.
Deliver high-quality premium themes to differentiate establishments visually and elevate brand perception.
Enhance operational efficiency by reducing administrative time spent on scheduling, financial closing, and client management.
Ensure scalability to support hundreds of establishments simultaneously with secure data isolation.
Offer an intuitive and mobile-first user experience optimized for various user personas including owners, staff, and end clients.
key_features: User authentication flows including secure login, registration, password recovery, and profile management using Supabase Auth.

Comprehensive appointment scheduling system featuring internal staff agenda, public online booking links without login, automatic blocking of unavailable times, and queue management for walk-in clients.
Financial management with sales recording, daily and monthly cash flow tracking, professional commission calculations, integration with Stripe for subscription payments.
Executive dashboards displaying KPIs such as revenue, average ticket size, and occupancy rates along with reports for financial insights.
Customizable visual themes: 'Barber' brutalist dark art deco style and 'Beauty' elegant neon art nouveau style, with automatic or manual theme switching based on establishment preference.
Mobile-first responsive design with aesthetic-driven UI including micro-interactions and animations optimized for PWA usage.
Security features including Row Level Security in Supabase for multi-tenant data isolation and route protection for administrative access.
Onboarding wizard facilitating new business setup, and team & service management modules.
Integration readiness with AI for future sentiment analysis or marketing content generation.
Digital queue system for managing client walk-ins efficiently.
user_flow_summary: Owners register and secure login using email and password, then configure their business profiles including branding and operating hours.
Staff members access their schedules via the internal agenda to manage appointments, mark services complete, and view queue status.
Clients use a public booking link to schedule appointments without needing to create an account, receiving instant confirmation via WhatsApp or email.
Owners use dashboard and reports pages to monitor financial and operational KPIs, manage commissions, and adjust settings.
Staff members utilize the queue management system to handle walk-in clients efficiently, updating statuses in real-time.
New establishments launch the onboarding wizard to setup the system tailored to their business needs, including team and service configurations.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication flows with secure login, registration, password recovery, and proper profile management implemented and tested.
Appointment booking system operates with correct calendar views, time blocking, multi-user coordination, and public booking links functioning as expected.
Financial management accurately tracks transactions, generates reports, calculates commissions, and integrates with Stripe payments reliably.
Dashboards and reports reflect real-time KPIs and financial data with correct visualization and filtering.
Custom themes apply consistently across the UI and can be switched manually or automatically according to preferences.
UI is fully responsive, performant on mobile devices, and supports offline usage as a PWA.
Security measures such as row-level data isolation and admin route protections are in place and verified.
Queue management system functions with real-time updates and proper status tracking for client flow.
Onboarding wizard provides a smooth setup experience, creating necessary configurations for business operation.
All integrations with external APIs (Stripe, Supabase, AI services) demonstrate stability and data integrity.
